title: Financial Fraud Detection System
description: Developed a machine learning model to detect fraudulent transactions in real-time. Processed over 1M+ records, achieving 98% accuracy. Reduced manual review time by 40%.

title: Automated Invoice Processing RPA
description: Built an end-to-end RPA solution using Power Automate to extract data from invoices and update the ERP system. Eliminated data entry errors and saved 20 hours/week.

title: Executive Sales Analytics Dashboard
description: Designed an interactive Power BI dashboard tracking KPIs like revenue growth, churn rate, and regional performance. Enabled data-driven decision making for the leadership team.
